/opt/rh/devtoolset-6/root/usr/bin/g++   -std=c++14 -Wall -pedantic -g -O3    CMakeFiles/As2.dir/main_noncurses.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/ncview/ui.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/ncview/window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/ncview/player_selection_window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/ncview/menu.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/ncview/main_menu.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/ncview/game_window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/ncview/add_player_window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/nc_controller/controller.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/nc_controller/command.cpp.o CMakeFiles/As2.dir/model/model.cpp.o  -o As2 -rdynamic
